visitation.translation[0].definitions[0]: an official visit to a place or person
visitation.translation[0].definitions[1]: an occasion when a parent is allowed to spend time with the children after a divorce, or the right to do this
visitation.translation[0].definitions[2]: an occasion when God or a spirit is believed to appear to someone on Earth
visitation.translation[0].definitions[3]: an event that is believed to be God’s punishment for something
visitation.translation[0].definitions[4]: a long visit from someone that you do not want to see – used humorously
